name: Miss Mind II: Ania
overview: Miss Mind II: Ania is a mastermind puzzle game. The player's task is to guess the sequence of five digits in six attempts. At the top of the screen the player indicates digits from 0 to 9. The results of the trials are shown on the top right side of the screen: full dot is a perfect match, half full dot means that the digit occurs in a different place. While the screenshot might indicate adult content, the picture is static and never escalates.
